In 2018, Helen Delaney feared she might not be around to witness the marriage of her son Andrew and his partner Laura.
Key points:

articles.author: TEGNA
articles.title: Uber to offer 10 million free, discounted rides for people seeking COVID-19 vaccinations - KREM.com
articles.description: Uber said it's partnered with groups dedicated to serving communities of color to ensure transportation is not a barrier to getting the COVID-19 vaccine.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON Uber is going to begin offering free or discounted rides to people who are getting COVID-19 vaccinations. 
The ride-hailing company said the program will include up to 10 million rides fo… [+1551 chars]
